category.name: Product Structure.CAD BOM Alignment
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PartStructureDepthForCompletenessCheck
preference.preference_description: Determines how many levels Teamcenter traverses when you perform a completeness check of the part structures resulting from CAD BOM alignment. Valid Values: Accepts any numeric value. If you enter 0 or a negative value, a completeness check is not performed.
